name: Zombodesert
description:
Are you afraid of running out of water in a desert? Well, it doesn't seem to be the biggest danger you can encounter.

The Zombodesert game presents a shooter between the main hero and the zombies you meet on your way. Your main mission is to cover as much distance as possible without being hit or turned into a monster. The theme of the game is Mexican, that's why from the very beginning you will feel that atmosphere of hats and traditional music of Mexico. We bet you will like it.

Game features:
  • 3 Weapons ( Maria,Carmen,Rosario)
  • 3 lives per attempt
  • Specifically mexican
